bool CSpectrometer::PaintSpectrum ( CDC *  pDC,
LPRECT  myrect,
CPen *  pen,
CSpectrumData &  data,
double  wmin,
double  wmax,
double  imin,
double  imax,
bool  redraw_axis = true,
bool  wavlen_line = true 
)

Draw a spectrum.

This is a helper function for all the other spectrum painters

Parameters:
wmin - set the axis minimum wavelength
wmax - set the axis maximum wavelength
imin - set the axis minimum intensity
imax - set the axis maximum intensity
pDC - pointer to drawing canvas
myrect - dimensions of whole canvas (what are the boundary conditions?)
pen - line color of spectrum
data - wavelengths and intensities
wmin - minimum wavelength of spectrum
wmax - maximum wavelength of spectrum
imin - minimum intensity / count value of spectrum
imax - maximum intensity / count value of spectrum
redraw_axis - allow suppressing axis drawing if we are painting multiple spectra
